#id=1
#text=I decided to bake a cake for my friend 's birthday .
#id=2
#text=I went to the store and purchased all the necessary ingredients .
#id=3
#text=When I got home , I turned on the oven to let it preheat .
#id=4
#text=I opened the box of cake mix and poured it into a bowl .
#id=5
#text=Following the instructions , I mixed in oil , eggs , and water until it was blended well .
#id=6
#text=I poured the batter into a cake pan and put it into the oven to bake .
#id=7
#text=While the cake was baking , I prepared the frosting by mixing powdered sugar , butter , milk and vanilla .
#id=8
#text=I also added some blue food dye to make the cake blue .
#id=9
#text=When the cake was finished baking and cooling off , I iced the cake with the frosting .
#text=When it was covered , I took some sprinkles and wrote '' `` Happy Birthday Joshua '' '' across the top .
#text=I added some candies around the edges and finished by putting the birthday candles on the cake .
#text=I brought the cake to his birthday party and everybody loved it .
